title: style pork and beans
description: A simple but generous vegetable and pork dish that’s rich in fibre and flavour. We temper the chilli heat with fat-free Greek yogurt.With a GI of 39 this meal is high protein, low GI and provides 322 kcal per portion.
ingredients: 250g/9oz pork tenderloin fillet, all visible fat removed, cut into 2cm/1in pieces
150g/5½oz gammon steak, all visible fat removed, cut into 2cm/1in pieces
2 x 400g tins cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
400ml/14fl oz pork or chicken stock, made with 1 stock cube
3 heaped tbsp chopped flatleaf parsley, to garnish
4 tbsp fat-free natural yoghurt or fromage frais, to serve
salt and freshly ground black pepper
